name: Cedric
personality: Blunt, gruff, and proud of honest work, but tempted by the coin that smuggling can bring.
lore: A seasoned blacksmith from the city forge who brings tools, nails, and horseshoes through the gate. Lately, rumors say he has been moving more than just iron.
tells_lying: avoids the question with a grunt
shifts his weight and looks past you
appearance: Broad-shouldered man in a soot-stained tunic and leather apron, with scarred forearms and short dark hair. He stands before a wooden cart stacked with tools and iron bars, the faint glow of a distant forge lighting the stone walls of Nottingham behind him.
